0.Text: Now, out of my way. Unless you want to die.

1.Text: H-how? We've never been bested in a battle of the bands.

2.Text: It's the metronome, Lyrica. She can keep up no matter how hard we play.

3.Text: She knew each note before they were even heard.

4.Text: You girls played well, but not well enough. I've had more fun with the fairies at the mansion.

5.Text: It was more than enough. We bought her the time she needs. The Resonate is ours!

6.Text: No matter who you're working for, she will be stopped. The Resonate will be returned to the mansion shortly.
